resources.string:
We starting to look at ways Cadpage can receive alerts from pagers or mobile radios that can connect to Android devices using Bluetooth or a USB cable. If your department uses radios with this capability and you would like us to develop a Cadpage interface to them, we would like to hear from you. The best way to contact us is by using the "Email the Developer" setting in Cadpage settings.
 
 New Locations:
 Houston County, GA
 Walton County, GA
 Adams County, MI
 Mecosta County, MI
 Osceola County, MI
 Faribault County, MN
 Marion County, WV
 Sheboygan County, WI
